item.title: First grade math exercise
item.description: Problem statement My son, being a first grader, recently struggled with this piece of math: Consider this system of equations: \[ a + b + c = 20\\ d + e + f = 14\\ g + h + i = 11\\ a + d + g = 15\\ b + e + h = 10\\ c + f + i = 20\\ a + e + i = 20\\ g + e + c = 10\]
